title: Building a team with remaining free agents
itunes:title: Building a team with remaining free agents
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling & Gregg Rosenthal – recap all the latest news from around the NFL including which rule changes to look for in 2017, and whether or not we’ll see Tony Romo on the field or in a TV booth come game time. Then, special guest Lil Debbie joins the show for more reaction to the Raiders relocation to Las Vegas. Plus, the heroes build a roster around the best remaining free agents and send them off to play for the San Diego Graybeards.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
